short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your bookmarks in the cloud and share them with your friends

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to Beemarks, the ultimate bookmark management tool for Chrome! With Beemarks, you can effortlessly save your favorite bookmarks and share them with friends and other users. Whether you want to keep track of your personal interests or discover new ones through your network, Beemarks has got you covered.
